column4: was the name given by the [[Elves]] to their own kind while they still dwelt at [[Cuiviénen]].  ''Quendë'' means "speaker; who speak with voices"
column5: for upon arising they met no other living thing that spoke or sang.<ref>{{S|Captivity}}</ref>  However
column6: [[Ilúvatar]] also called them ''Quendi'' before any of them awoke.<ref>{{S|Days}}</ref>

column1: The plural form was much more popular as a word.
The word is a direct derivative of the [[Primitive Quendian]] word ''[[Kwende]]'' from [[Sundocarmë|Root]] [[KWE]]NE.<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}
''Quendë'' is an exceptional case where the PQ short final ''-e'' was retained in Quenya instead of disappearing.
